gameplay.title: Quiz Time
gameplay.quitMessage: Do you want to return to the main menu?
gameplay.sortGuide: Drag the buttons into the correct order.

liquids_units_integers.title: Units Equivalence (Integers)
liquids_units_integers.guide: Convert whole-number liquid measurements between litres, decilitres, centilitres, and millilitres.

liquids_units_decimals.title: Units Equivalence (Decimals)
liquids_units_decimals.guide: Convert decimal liquid measurements between litres, decilitres, centilitres, and millilitres.

integer_liquids_calculation.title: Add/Subtract Liquids (Integers)
integer_liquids_calculation.guide: Add or subtract the given whole-number liquid measures and answer in millilitres.

decimal_liquids_calculation.title: Add/Subtract Liquids (Decimals)
decimal_liquids_calculation.guide: Add or subtract the given decimal liquid measures and answer in millilitres.

advanced_decimal_liquids_calculation.title: Multiply/Divide Liquids (Decimals)
advanced_decimal_liquids_calculation.guide: Multiply or divide decimal liquid measures and answer in millilitres.

easy_liquid_mass.title: Salt in Water
easy_liquid_mass.guide: Use the mg/ml ratio to find the mass of salt in the water.

watering_liquid_mass.title: Diluting Solution
watering_liquid_mass.guide: Calculate the new salt mass after diluting the solution with water.

blending_liquid_mass.title: Mixing Solutions
blending_liquid_mass.guide: Combine the given solutions and report the total salt mass.

easy_liquid_percent.title: Salt in Water
easy_liquid_percent.guide: Use the percentage to find how much salt is in the water.

watering_liquid_percent.title: Diluting Solution
watering_liquid_percent.guide: Work out the new percentage strength after adding water.

blending_liquid_percent.title: Mixing Solutions
blending_liquid_percent.guide: Find the resulting percentage when two solutions are mixed.

sort_liquid_units.title: Sort Liquid Measures
sort_liquid_units.guide: Arrange the liquid measurements from smallest to largest.

sort_liquid_units_decimal.title: Sort Liquid Measures (Decimals)
sort_liquid_units_decimal.guide: Arrange the liquid measurements from smallest to largest.

liquid_mass_concentration_amount.title: Salt Amount from Concentration
liquid_mass_concentration_amount.guide: A solution has salt concentration {concentration}. How many mg of salt are in {volumeLabel}?

sort_liquid_mass_concentration.title: Sort by Concentration
sort_liquid_mass_concentration.guide: Arrange the solutions from lowest to highest concentration
